descriptor.long_desc:
Aromatherapy lavender sleep spray that helps with good sleep, better sleep.
Spray 7-8 pumps of sleep mist on pillow, bedsheet before sleeping. Sleep support for deep sleeping.
Natural, no drowsiness, non addictive. Substitute for sleep gummies, sleep pills, sleeping tablets.
All natural formula. Does not act as melatonin spray, not for insomnia. Use for better sleep quality.
Essential oil (lavender & chamomile) based sleeping spray can be used as a pillow mist and acts as a sleep support, sleep supplements, sleep aid.
 Ingredients: Purified Water, Propanediol, Heptyl Glucoside, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, IFRA Certified Perfume, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe-Vera) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternafolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil, Sodium Gluconate, Allantoin
 Manufactured by: Naturis Cosmetics Pvt. Ltd., 1-EPIP, SIDCO, Bari Brahmana, Jammu - 181133, J&K. Mfg. Lic. No.: JK/21-22/COS-8/334.
 Marketed By: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd., 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034.
 Caution: Starry Night Sleep Mist is for external use only. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with clean water

descriptor.long_desc:
Cooling pain relief spray with natural actives for fast acting relief.
Use post a tiring day in cricket, gym or office. Athletes turn to hoop pain relief sprays for muscle pain.
Natural, herbal, ayurvedic ice spray for pain relief. Substitute for pain relief oils, pain relief gel.
Cryotherapy cooling helps with sports injuries, heel pain, feet pain, sciatica pain.
FDA Approved, Derma Tested, GMP Certified, Cruelty Free, Safe for Daily Use, Ayurvedic Approved.
 Ingredients: Menthol, Eucalyptus, Inerts, Solvents & Propellant
 Manufactured by: Accra Pac (India) Pvt. Ltd., Plot No.: 1105, Phase- III, G.I.D.C., Vapi, Gujarat- 396195. Mfg. Lic. No.: GA/1478.
 Marketed By: Hedso Health and Wellness Pvt. Ltd., 28 Vidya Vihar, West Enclave, Pitampura, Delhi - 110034.
 Caution: For external use only. Do not spray on open flame. Do not spray near eyes or face. Protect the face when spraying near neck or shoulders. Avoid direct inhalation. Keep out of reach of children. Do not spray on open wounds or damanged skin. Use as directed, contact a physician if the condition worsens. If pregnant or breast feeding, ask a physician before use.
 Shake well before each use. Hold 6 inches away from affected area and spray. Repeat 3-4 times a day. Massage not necessary.

Epsom salt for bath in body wash helps relax muscles, lavender induces calm, aloe vera hydrates skin.
Epsom salt can be used as a foot soak, hand soak. When mixed in warm water eases muscle soreness, relaxation.
Fresh lavender & rose fragrance from pure essential oils and IFRA certified fragrance for daily use.
Workout, sports essential that can be used after a tiring day for relaxation. Epsom eases muscle cramps & aches.
Use in daily morning shower for energy & all evening relaxation epsom bath.
